page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: Tourism. Tourism has grown considerably over the past ten years and is an important source of employment. Local people realise the importance of tourism to the local economy and tolerate it. They understand why the area is becoming more popular but are concerned that tourism should not be allowed to develop too much. Caravan parks and a holiday chalet development in Nawton and caravan sites provided by local farmers are recent developments which local people find "understandable but regrettable".
